data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Haddad, Charles R. (2014): A revision of the endemic South African sac spider genus Lessertina Lawrence, 1942 (Araneae: Eutichuridae). Zootaxa 3873 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3873.1.7
